snippet.title: Project A-ko (プロジェクトA子) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Project A-ko is a board video game based on the anime movie of the same name. One or two players can participate. If chosen one player, the player competes against the AI.

The goal is to be the first to reach the school at the end of the board. Player 1 is A-ko while player 2/the AI is B-ko. C-ko will throw the dice for the players (in 1-player mode the game will only show her throwing it for the player but it won't show her throwing for the computer).

The players will find items they can use and go to special fields that will trigger an event. The events are random and can benefit one player while being a negative aspect for the other player.

Sometimes A-ko and B-ko will also battle. Whoever loses the battle has to move some fields back.

There is no sound or music in this game!
